Helper

DisableInterrupt
inline void DisableInterrupt()

Disable interruption

Halt
inline void Halt()

Pause the CPU until a new interruption occured

u16 addr
)

Address to call

inline void CallA(
u16 addr,
u8 a
)

Parameters
addr
u16

Address to call

a
u8

Function parameter to put in register A

u16 addr,
u16 hl
